com.gamelanlabs.chimple2.tests

Class RandomCoinTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gamelanlabs.chimple2.tests.RandomCoinTests

  • public class RandomCoinTests
extends java.lang.Object
    Some random tests, piggybacking on the RandomCoin demo. Run with JUnit4 in Eclipse.
    Author:
    BenL

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomCoinTests() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void forwardHistogramIsUniform()
      We run forward on RandomCoin and make sure the output is approximately uniform.
      void MHWithBetaBinIsBetaBin()
      We run traceMH on RandomCoin with BetaBinCostFunction and make sure the output is approximately BetaBin(20, 16, 6).
      void MHWithNoCostIsUniform()
      We run traceMH on RandomCoin but no cost function and make sure the output is approximately uniform.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomCoinTests

        public RandomCoinTests()

    • Method Detail

      • forwardHistogramIsUniform

        public void forwardHistogramIsUniform()
        We run forward on RandomCoin and make sure the output is approximately uniform. The KL divergence is usually <0.01, so to be safe we compare it to 0.02.

      • MHWithNoCostIsUniform

        public void MHWithNoCostIsUniform()
        We run traceMH on RandomCoin but no cost function and make sure the output is approximately uniform. The KL divergence is usually <0.1, so to be safe we compare it to 0.2.

      • MHWithBetaBinIsBetaBin

        public void MHWithBetaBinIsBetaBin()
        We run traceMH on RandomCoin with BetaBinCostFunction and make sure the output is approximately BetaBin(20, 16, 6). The KL divergence is usually <0.1, so to be safe we compare it to 0.2.
